channel.title: Guthix is balance "Guthix GS REMOVE THEM"
channel.description:
Guthix is balance he is not strong... he is powerfull but he is a balanced god... he dosent beleive in war... or fighting... so He doesent have a sword... and never will... So all the privates i sean with them... are spiting in the face of the god of guthix... i know guthix isent real but you have to act like it is if your develuping somthing i know i mispelled things cuz my computer dosent has spellcheck anyway... guthix has a staff... he lets magic do his combat hense " Claws of guthix " and "book of balance" abd "guthix cape" and a few more magical items... BUT NO MEELEE items becuase he is not about combat and rarly even uses his powers.
end of my rant on guthix gs's

`Rich is a fucking noob mod.

[/sarcasm]
